Current Version

Maven

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.writeforward</groupId>
  <artifactId>logger</artifactId>
  <version>0.0.2</version>
</dependency>

Gradle

'org.writeforward:logger:0.0.2'

SBT

libraryDependencies += "org.writeforward" % "logger" % "0.0.2"
